title: Did Oregon’s Anti-Gay Cake Bakers Win the Lottery?
subtitle: A story about two bakers who won a big lottery payout just after being slapped with a fine came from a site that only publishes satire and fake news.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The Christian owners of a bakery in Oregon won the lottery shortly after they were fined $135,000 for declining to make a cake for a same-sex wedding.
